newsitem.title: USA: Apria Healthcare, Vitas may end merger pact.
newsitem.headline: Apria Healthcare, Vitas may end merger pact.

text.p: Apria Healthcare Group Inc said it was talking with Vitas Healthcare Corp about scrapping the merger agreement between the two companies and entering into some other type of business relationship.

The deal calls for a unit of Apria, a provider of in-home patient services and equipment, to merge with Miami-based hospice operator Vitas in a $212 million pooling-of-interest transaction involving the transfer of stock and assumption of debt. Vitas would become a subsidiary of Apria Healthcare.
